text: Hong Ji-yoon is a South Korean actress under KeyEast. She is best known for her role in the Korean television series My First First Love (2019). ==Career== ===2017–present: Career beginnings=== Hong Ji-yoon made her debut in tvN's Criminal Minds in 2017, as Park In-hye. She also starred in Bad Guys 2. She played the role of Oh Ji-ran in What's Wrong with Secretary Kim. She played a supporting role in Netflix's original series My First First Love with Ji Soo, Jung Chae-yeon and Jin Young. She made a cameo appeared as actress Ruby in My Absolute Boyfriend. Hong Ji-yoon has also partaken in the drama My Country which premiered in September 2019 on JTBC. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- | 2018 | Monstrum | Mother | |} ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Year !Title !Role !Network !Ref. |- | rowspan="2" |2017 | Criminal Minds | Park In-hye | tvN | |- | Bad Guys 2 | Han So-yeong | OCN | |- | rowspan="2" |2018 | Return | Bang Seon-yeong | SBS | |- | What's Wrong with Secretary Kim | Oh Ji-ran | tvN | |- | rowspan="3" |2019 | My First First Love | Ryu Se-hyeon | Netflix | |- | My Absolute Boyfriend | Ruby | SBS TV | |- | My Country | Hwa-wol | JTBC | |} ==References== ==External links== *Hong Ji-yoon at KeyEast * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean television actresses Category:South Korean film actresses Category:South Korean television presenters Category:21st-century South Korean actresses
